StellarSpectra documentation
============================

StellarSpectra is designed to infer stellar properties such as effective temperature :math:`T_{\rm eff}`, surface
gravity :math:`\log(g)`, and metallicity :math:`[{\rm Fe}/{\rm H}]` from high resolution spectra using a Bayesian model.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   grid_tools
   model

.. math::

   \pi_T(x) = \left[ l(x) \right]^{\frac{1}{T}} p(x)

Copyright Ian Czekala 2013, 2014
